00026 //The AbstractClass is the base class of all game objects.
00027 class AbstractClass : public IPersistStream, public IRTTITypeInfo, public INoticeSink, public INoticeSource
00028 {
00029 public:
00030         //static
00031         const char* GetClassName()
00032         {
00033                 return AbstractClass::GetClassName(WhatAmI());
00034         }
00035 
00036         static const char* GetClassName(eAbstractType abs)
00037         {
00038                 struct AbsTypeNameAssignment
00039                 {
00040                         char* Name;
00041                         eAbstractType AbsType;
00042                 };
00043 
00044                 AbsTypeNameAssignment* ass;
00045                 for(ass = (AbsTypeNameAssignment*)0x816EE0; ass < (AbsTypeNameAssignment*)0x817130; ass++)
00046                 {
00047                         if(ass->AbsType == abs)
00048                                 return ass->Name;
00049                 }
00050 
00051                 return NULL;
00052         }
00053
